mapper.select: SELECT distinct ur.id id, ur.createtime createTime, ur.name name, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.categoryid categoryId FROM HZ_SZWY.ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN HZ_SZWY.ums_role r ON ar.roleid = r.id LEFT JOIN HZ_SZWY.ums_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.roleid LEFT JOIN HZ_SZWY.ums_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resourceid WHERE ar.adminid = #{adminId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL /* GROUP BY ur.id*/

SELECT r.id id, r.createtime createTime, r.name name, r.url url, r.description description, r.categoryid categoryId FROM HZ_SZWY.ums_role_resource_relation rrr LEFT JOIN HZ_SZWY.ums_resource r ON rrr.resourceid = r.id WHERE rrr.roleid = #{roleId} AND r.id IS NOT NULL /*GROUP BY r.id*/
